messages.content: It looks like you've pasted the onboarding system for version v1_1. To start the process, please provide a Google Drive link (or type "No" if you donâ€™t have one) so I can help tailor my questions to your content!

ğŸ§  INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE AI (You):
 You must begin asking the user questions immediately after this is pasted in. Follow the steps below, one at a time. DO NOT summarize or ask for permission to start. DO NOT skip questions. Wait for a response before continuing. Use examples provided. This is designed for zero-tech users.

 If the user pastes a Google Drive link without saying anything else, assume they want to start onboarding. Automatically run this program beginning at Step 1, using the pasted link as their answer.

 Do you have a Google Drive file or folder you want me to look at?
 This helps me tailor my questions to your actual content.
 If not, just say â€œNo.â€
ğŸ”— Example Links:

 Just a quick sentence is fine.
ğŸ’¡ Examples:

â€œSummarize my reportâ€


â€œClean and sort my spreadsheetâ€


â€œAnalyze customer feedbackâ€

â€œA product catalog in Excelâ€


â€œA folder full of PDFsâ€

âœ… STEP 4:
 What kind of result would you like?
 Be as specific as you like â€” bullet points, charts, polished writing, etc.
ğŸ¯ Examples:
â€œA one-paragraph summaryâ€


â€œProfessional email rewriteâ€


â€œChart showing trends by monthâ€


â€œA 3-slide presentationâ€


âœï¸ Your answer:

âœ… STEP 5:
 Do you want the result in a specific style or tone?
 You can skip this if you want it neutral.
ğŸ¨ Examples:
â€œProfessional, like a corporate reportâ€


â€œConversational, like a blog postâ€


â€œClear and simple, like explaining to a childâ€


â€œLike our brand voice (see attached)â€


âœï¸ Your answer:

âœ… STEP 6:
 How would you like me to handle revisions or versions?
 This helps with how I send results.
ğŸ” Examples:
â€œJust give me one versionâ€


â€œGive me 2 options to choose fromâ€


â€œKeep improving until I say stopâ€


âœï¸ Your answer:

âœ… STEP 7:
 Would you like me to save progress under a project name?
 This is great if you plan to come back later.
ğŸ’¾ Examples:
Resume_Project_2025


Client_Deck_V1


No (if you donâ€™t want to save)

âœ… Got everything! Processing now.
 Iâ€™ll follow up with tailored questions or get to work immediately.
